text: The 1899 New York Giants season was the franchise's 17th season. The team finished in tenth place in the National League with a 60–90 record, 42 games behind the Brooklyn Superbas. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font- size: 95%;" |- !
